ygData.subject: Re: AC Proof
ygData.msgSnippet: Drew, All I know is the stuff you guys from PPI  write is usually right on the mark, and for that I do respect your input on this topic. It is one of the
ygData.messageBody:
Drew,

All I know is the stuff you guys from PPI write is usually right on the mark, and
for that I do respect your input on this topic. It is one of the reasons I gave
you the URL to join up on this mailing list.

I find the information you provided great and reposted it on my guild's BB. It was
good timing since someone had asked a question as to what armor to get next.

Look forward to other things you post on this mailing list.

Suz
